title: reset control settings
body: is there away reset control settings back to default?

replies.body:
Yup! The following steps will help you reset your input settings:

First, log into League, then visit your installation folder, which should be here: **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

Delete the folder named **"CONFIG"**

You'll then want to hop into a custom match to see if it's gone through properly. Let me know if this helped.
